sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Banking on Illinois Act.

sections.heading: Findings and declarations of policy.
sections.text:
The General Assembly hereby
finds and declares:

sections.heading: Purpose.
sections.text:
The purpose of this Act is to encourage and provide a
favorable environment in Illinois for the chartering and operating of
banks
that locate and maintain main banking offices in this State.

sections.heading: Effective date.
sections.text: This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
